skillTree.localised_description: Smaller than their powerful Bretonnian equivalents, barding protects Imperial warhorses from blows that would otherwise fell these proud beasts.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

skillTree.localised_description:
"Ulric give me the fangs of the wolf,
	Ulric give me the claws of the wolf,
	Ulric give me the coat of the wolf,
	And I will show your enemies the mercy of the wolf."
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior has something of an anger management problem. Funnily enough, no one has yet found a safe way to broach the issue.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

skillTree.localised_description: Vorn is a respected warrior who has been given the honour of being chosen to enter the Teutogen Guard for his service within the Knights of the White Wolf, holding a powerful position within the order.
Vorn Thugenheim is inspired with the martial spirit of Ulric. He trains diligently every day, rising an hour before his peers to practice his weapons training and to run through the forests.

Despite his talent and high rank, he remains humble, and feels more comfortable with the common soldiery than the nobles. As an inspiration to Middenheim's defenders, Vorn is able to lift their spirits when he walks the walls at their side - a talent that will be needed in the dark times ahead.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +7% for all Empire Knights units (excluding Demigryph Knights)
	(Hero's army)

Missile resistance: 7% for all Empire Knights units (excluding Demigryph Knights)
	(Hero's army)

Passive ability: "Rage" for all Empire Knights units (excluding Demigryph Knights)
	(Hero's army)

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +15% for all Empire Knights units (excluding Demigryph Knights)
	(Hero's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for all Empire Knights units (excluding Demigryph Knights)
	(Hero's army)

Passive ability: "Rage" for all Empire Knights units (excluding Demigryph Knights)
	(Hero's army)

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

skillTree.localised_description: Vorn has excelled in all areas of his schooling, mastering the litanies of Ulric and proving himself as skilled swordsman and hunter.

Loyal, steadfast and fierce, he is the right hand of the Elector Count, Boris Todbringer. His father, Vieran was one of Todbringer's closest confidants and advisers. He gave his life for his lord in the same battle that Todbringer lost his eye in a desperate battle against the foul Beastmen of the Drakwald, led by Khazrak the One-Eye.

effects.description: Melee attack: +8 while embedded in Boris Todbringer's army
Melee defence: +8 while embedded in Boris Todbringer's army
Attribute: Unbreakable while embedded in Boris Todbringer's army

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Blink and you die.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

items.colour_text: A perfectly round stone set into a golden amulet, the Heart of Middenheim is crafted from a fragment of the keystone of the gateway to the Temple of Ulric. It has been carried by some of the finest warriors ever to have lived in the City of the White Wolf.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

items.colour_text: Few years ago the villages around Middenheim were terrorised by a massive wolf, which became known as Horros after a savage folkloric beast. When it was finally slain by Vorn himself, the wolf's spirit was imprisoned within its pelt, bestowing the wearer with primal strength.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Todbringer took Vorn under his wing when he was still a young boy, raising him as his own son. Nevertheless, he was a stern father figure with high demands and expectations, being particularly cautious not to let the young lad have a privileged upbringing.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).
